Articles.Content: hey anyone else having problems with missing parts because the PA550 doesn't want to show up for me...

hey anyone else having problems with missing parts because the PA550 doesn't want to show up for me...

Nope. Shows up fine. Maybe you installed it to the wrong place.

Hey, any chance of updating it so crews can be transfered from part to part using the stock 0.25 option? As it stands, the centrifugal part shows zero crew available while trying to enter on EVA in flight and a few others can't be crewed from the VAB. The centrifuge, at least, doesn't allow crew transfer with the new 0.25 option

Hey Starwaster, sorry for the redundant post, but i'm having some trouble finding a place for the tweak .cfg file, I tried placing it in the root Gamedata folder but I still had the bug.

I don't have a dedicated tweaks folder, so would there be any way to integrate it into the centrifuge part .cfg ?

Hey Starwaster, sorry for the redundant post, but i'm having some trouble finding a place for the tweak .cfg file, I tried placing it in the root Gamedata folder but I still had the bug.

I don't have a dedicated tweaks folder, so would there be any way to integrate it into the centrifuge part .cfg ?

Do you have the plugin too? The config by itself does nothing. And it can go anywhere.

Also you need modulemanager.

As to whether it can be integrated into the part file, it can be. Just look at anything that starts with a @. That modifies the part or module whose name appears in brackets.

I wish the FLAT had an IVA and that the PA550 had a 2.5m node instead of 1.25m. Other than that, I love this pack because I'm a sucker for anything with well-designed IVAs. I'd love to see more development.

Is there a version for KSP 0.25?

@Raptor22:

Please read the last 10-20 posts of a thread before posting. Starwaster has been keeping this working and has posted instructions.

Is there a version for KSP 0.25?

Love it! A few questions (sorry I am catching up)

1. I assume they can be landed for a land station and not just a space station.

2. any known major bugs with other mods or with game itself?

Is there a version for KSP 0.25?
This should work as long as you have an up to date firespitter.dll.

Edit: ninja'd.

Love it! A few questions (sorry I am catching up)

1. I assume they can be landed for a land station and not just a space station.

2. any known major bugs with other mods or with game itself?

  1. Yes though I find the ring and the larger inflatables a little unwieldy for anything but orbital use because of their size. (and the ring because of its rotation)
  2. Regarding the ring habitat, there is an animation issue that renders it uninhabitable if both rotation and inflation animations are activated. Bug affects both stock and Firespitter animator modules. See my link below. Download the plugin mentioned there and the config file. Install the plugin and put the config file anywhere in your GameData folder. Preferably in a folder that you keep for such patches or in the Habitat's folder.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64442-0-23-5-Habitat-Pack-v0-4?p=1448802&viewfull=1#post1448802
Now gotta figure out how to make these thing works like workspace modules for MKS/OKS...anyone got a pointer for a noob?

Now gotta figure out how to make these thing works like workspace modules for MKS/OKS...anyone got a pointer for a noob?

They need to have the same MODULE's added that an MKS/OKS part would use to provide the same functionality that you need. Ask in the MKS mod what you need added. Don't edit part files directly, make a module manager patch to do it.

(i.e.)


@PART[inflato1]
{
	MODULE
	{
		name = <INSERT THE NAME OF THE MKS MODULE THAT YOU NEED)
		whatever else the module needs.
	}
}
